snippet: Motivated by a long child custody dispute, a man opened fire on Monday in the lobby of the New Castle County Courthouse, leaving two women dead before police officers fatally shot him.
abstract: Delaware man, apparently motivated by long custody dispute, opens fire in lobby of New Castle County Courthouse, killing two women dead before police officers fatally shoot him.
lead_paragraph: Motivated by a long child custody dispute, a man opened fire on Monday in the lobby of the New Castle County Courthouse, leaving two women dead before police officers fatally shot him.

headline.main: Delaware: Three Dead in Courthouse Shooting
headline.print_headline: Delaware: Three Dead In Courthouse Shooting
